[Home](index.md) &gt; [@multiversx/sdk-core](sdk-core.md) &gt; [TransferTransactionsFactory](sdk-core.transfertransactionsfactory.md)

## TransferTransactionsFactory class

Use this class to create transactions for native token transfers (EGLD) or custom tokens transfers (ESDT/NTF/MetaESDT).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TransferTransactionsFactory 
```

## Constructors

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[(constructor)(options)](sdk-core.transfertransactionsfactory._constructor_.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Should be instantiated using `Config` and `TokenComputer`<!-- -->. Instantiating this class using GasEstimator represents the legacy version of this class. The legacy version contains methods like `createEGLDTransfer`<!-- -->, `createESDTTransfer`<!-- -->, `createESDTNFTTransfer` and `createMultiESDTNFTTransfer`<!-- -->. This was done in order to minimize breaking changes in client code.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
